actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code in order to specify those officials of the Department of Defense who are entitled to the use of Government-owned passenger vehicles for transportation between their places of domicile and places of employment.

summary.text: Provides that, within the Department of Defense and the military departments, only the Secretary of Defense, the Secretary of the Army, the Secretary of the Navy, and the Secretary of the Air Force are entitled to the use of Government-owned passenger motor vehicles for transportation between their respective domiciles and places of employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code in order to specify those officials of the Department of Defense who are entitled to the use of Government-owned passenger vehicles for transportation between their places of domicile and places of employment.
